mapper.select: select transfer_record_pay_name,count(*) from transfer_record transfer_record_pay_fee>=#{fee} and transfer_record_pay_name!=transfer_record_collection_name group by transfer_record_pay_name

select transfer_record_collection_name,count(*) from transfer_record transfer_record_pay_fee>=#{fee} and transfer_record_pay_name!=transfer_record_collection_name group by transfer_record_collection_name
select sum(transfer_record_pay_fee) from transfer_record where transfer_record_pay_name!=transfer_record_collection_name and transfer_record_flow='转出' and transfer_record_status='SUCCESS'
select sum(transfer_record_pay_fee) from transfer_record where transfer_record_pay_name!=transfer_record_collection_name and transfer_record_flow='转入' and transfer_record_status='SUCCESS'
SELECT count(*) from transfer_record where transfer_record_pay_name!=transfer_record_collection_name and transfer_record_pay_name=#{name} GROUP BY transfer_record_pay_name
SELECT count(*) from transfer_record where transfer_record_pay_name!=transfer_record_collection_name and transfer_record_collection_name=#{name} GROUP BY transfer_record_collection_name
